description: Logistic Regression scores LB 0.800In this kernel, we present a simple logistic regression model for Kaggle's "Instant Gratification" competition. This kernel demonstrates that interactions between the variable wheezy-copper-turtle-magic and the other variables exist. And it demonstrates that a simple model can perform well. Without interactions LR (logistic regression) scores CV 0.530, and with interactions LR scores CV 0.805 and LB 0.808 Load Data
